title: Ticket #3141: condor_power issues
description:
There are a variety of minor issues in condor_power that should get resolved.

  • The -p option does not actually do anything meaningful.
  • There is no "output" file for condor_power.
  • Argument parsing is very brittle and does not warn about mutually exclusive options.
  • The help text has a few mistakes in it.
attachments:
• power.patch 2810 bytes added by ziliang on 2012-Jul-18 21:56:29 UTC.
    This patch includes all of my current work. During testing however I ran into inconsistent results. As such, I am not comfortable committing this until I can confirm I did not break anything.
creator: ziliang
